headline: 1 Cash-Burning Stock with Promising Prospects and 2 We Avoid
summary: Companies that burn cash at a rapid pace can run into serious trouble if they fail to secure funding. Without a clear path to profitability, these businesses risk dilution, mounting debt, or even bankruptcy.
